update.description:
This builds on top of pull request #2129.

This is the first draft of the palette. The palette contains 3 tabs:

### Topics tab

#### Top pane

List of all topics advertised the moment the dialog was opened.

#### Bottom pane

List plottable fields for a topic selected on the top pane. The fields are hierarchically arranged. Those which are plottable can be dragged and dropped.

### Sim tab

#### Top pane

Empty by design

#### Bottom pane

Hard coded values (sim/real time and iterations) which can be dragged to the plot.

### Search tab

#### Top pane

Contains search box and search results from the other tabs. Some results can be dragged directly from here, others can be expanded on the bottom pane.

#### Bottom pane

Displays fields from whatever was selected on the top pane.

![plotpalette.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/825853685-plotpalette.png)
update.title: Plot Palette: Topics, Sim and Search

pull_request.title: Plot Palette: Topics, Sim and Search
